title: 因為皇馬單野，西班牙準備世界盃前換走個領隊..

replies.msg:
The Spanish Football Federation have confirmed that a press conference will take place later, with reports suggesting they could have a new coach in place for their match against Portugal on Friday.

The national team have been thrown into disarray after Julen Lopetegui was confirmed as next season’s Real Madrid boss – just a week after he had signed a contract extension with La Roja.

RFEF chief Luis Rubiales will talk to the gathered press in Krasnodar on Wednesday, but reports are suggesting that Fernando Hierro or Under-21 manager Albert Celades could take over from Lopetegui in time for their opening World Cup match against the Portuguese in two days time.

Faced with the fait accompli, the president of the Spanish Federation, Luis Rubiales, then expressed his dismay, but also his annoyance. So much so that he immediately mentioned, in a small committee, the possibility of dismissing his coach with immediate effect, that is to say 2 days before the start of the Roja competition, in a particularly important match. in Portugal (Friday at 8 pm)! This hypothesis would have some supporters within the instance, as the blow is hard. Lopetegui had recently signed an extension until 2020.
利狗仔怨婦
